metadata.name: Hourglass Prime ???
metadata.description: One day the Hourglass of time that was gifted to us to inspire others and lead by example suddenly started to tremble. It ascended into the skies, glowing, filled up with tremendous amounts of energy until it shattered into 888 unique pieces, bestowing upon the most committed of us a fragment of its power. Carry it with confidence. Carry it with pride. You are a true timekeeper!
